title: Constant Freezing In game
body: Hi, ever since Friday, i have been having this problem lately where whenever i play league, i just get these random freezes like fps drops 60fps - 2fps. I tired reinstalling league, doing updates, reinstalling the latest patch. Nothings seems to work for me. Any help would be appreciated :)

replies.body:
Hey iCantBlockHit,

Can you run through the steps in the [Troubleshooting Lag or Low FPS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115007595768) Riot Support article? Let me know if that helps, or if the issue persists!
